name: Quick Baby Bok Choy with Garlic
author: wiebke
summary: I prefer to use baby bok choy for this recipe, but you can also use large bok choy. The cook time is really quick, so have all the ingredients ready before you start.
ingredients: salt and freshly ground black pepper
directions: Heat a wok over medium heat
Add oil and allow to get hot
Add garlic and stir-fry until fragrant, about 30 seconds
Add bok choy and cook for 30 seconds
Season with soy sauce, sugar, and salt and stir-fry for 1 minute
Pour water into the wok, cover, and simmer until leaves are dark green and stems are tender, but still firm, 2 to 3 minutes
Remove from heat, drizzle with sesame oil, and season with pepper
